channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title: 中国正在悄然减少对外国芯片技术的依赖。官员们考虑的不是效率，而是安全--他们认为付出这样的代价是值得的 👇
item.description: China is quietly reducing its reliance on foreign chip technology. Officials have not efficiency but security in mind—and they’ve decided the price is worth paying econ.st/48fJlPg 👇

item.title: 在家工作会引发金融危机吗？这就是人们的担忧，但这种担忧被夸大了👇。
item.description: Is working from home about to spark a financial crisis? That is the worry, but it is overblown econ.st/49f3N3Z 👇

item.title:
一场由梅西（Lionel Messi）出战的足球表演赛旨在吸引外国人来香港。然而，这场比赛却让香港看起来像大陆，令人担忧：
照片：Imago
item.description:
An exhibition football match featuring Lionel Messi was meant to help attract foreigners to Hong Kong. Instead it made the city look worryingly like the mainland: econ.st/48AsKpz

Photo: Imago

item.title: 中国正在太平洋地区获取资源、购买政治影响力并寻求军事准入。澳大利亚的担忧可以理解，但被过分夸大了 👇。
item.description: China is securing resources, buying political influence and seeking military access in the Pacific. Australia’s concerns are understandable, but overblown econ.st/3OL9FK8 👇

item.title: 两个月的破坏活动和大规模抗议打破了智利 2019 年的稳定。为了继续前进，智利需要在政治和增长问题上达成广泛协议 👇。
item.description: Two months of vandalism and massive protests shattered Chile’s stability in 2019. To move on, the country needs broad agreements on questions of politics and growth econ.st/3SyFN4I 👇

item.title: 如何不搞大型项目：HS2 对英国及其他国家的启示 👇
item.description: How not to do a megaproject: the lessons of HS2 for Britain and beyond econ.st/3SHNi9t 👇

item.title: 你不知道的六本宣传书籍 👇
item.description: Six books you didn’t know were propaganda econ.st/3SvFVBV 👇

item.title: 亲吻表妹真的可以吗？在美国许多州，这是违法的 ⬇️
item.description: Is it really OK to kiss your cousin? In many American states it is illegal econ.st/3UHRkS0 ⬇️

item.title:
海南岛是中国最南端的一个岛屿，游客可以在这里享受免税购物、热带雨林徒步旅行和电影节。
但是，随着国际旅游的恢复，海南岛可能需要新的方式来吸引中国的富裕游客 👇。
item.description:
Visitors to Hainan, an island off China’s southernmost tip, can enjoy duty-free shopping, hikes through tropical forests and film festivals.

But as international travel resumes, the island may need new ways of attracting China’s wealthy travellers econ.st/3wkD8UM 👇

item.title: 近 70% 的美国成年人超重，超过三分之一的人肥胖。 但美国也有健康美食--只要你知道去哪里找 👇
item.description: Nearly 70% of American adults are overweight; over a third are obese.⁠ But America has healthy cuisines—if you know where to look econ.st/4bs3pkg 👇

item.title: 长期以来，美国一直被我们的姊妹公司 EIU 归类为 "有缺陷的民主国家"。请参阅今年民主指数的完整排名： 👇
item.description: America has long been categorised as a “flawed democracy” by EIU, our sister company. See the full ranking in this year’s democracy index: econ.st/48i11cP 👇

item.title: @econcallum 告诉我们的 "Money Talks "播客，旧金山在很多方面 "仍然失败"。但与此同时，美国的科技之都正在经历一场 "明确无误、非常清晰的人工智能热潮" 👇。
item.description: San Francisco is “still failing” in many ways, @econcallum tells our “Money Talks” podcast. But America’s tech capital is experiencing an “unmistakable and very clear AI boom” at the same time econ.st/3wueJfm 👇

item.title:
温布尔登中心球场曾上演过多场精彩对决。但有一场比赛永远值得关注，那就是裁判对机器的比赛。
图片：Getty Images盖蒂图片社
item.description:
Wimbledon’s centre court has seen its share of rivalries. But one match always worth tuning in for is umpire v machine econ.st/49AbrFV

Image: Getty Images

item.title: 白天，曼哈顿的刑事法庭是一座熙熙攘攘的建筑。但到了下午 5 点，夜庭就会接管这里。我们的记者坐在轮班的 ⬇️ 上。
item.description: By day, Manhattan’s Criminal Court is a bustling building. But come 5pm, the Night Court takes over. Our correspondent sits in on a shift econ.st/3whexQS ⬇️

item.title: 欧洲有可能免受特朗普的影响吗？前总统的可能回归给最近举行的慕尼黑安全会议蒙上了一层阴影 👇
item.description: Is it possible to Trump-proof Europe? The possible return of the former president has cast a dark pall over the recent Munich Security Conference econ.st/3SLincp 👇

item.title: 他抵制俄罗斯政权所代表的一切：腐败、裙带关系、贪婪、道德败坏。他知道，因为这种反抗，他会遭到无休止的骚扰、监禁、噤声--甚至被杀害 👇 👇
item.description: He resisted everything the Russian regime stood for: corruption, cronyism, greed, moral rot. For that opposition he knew he would be endlessly harassed, imprisoned, silenced—or even killed econ.st/49fc8Vl👇 👇

item.title: 一种 "涡轮增压超级猪 "正在加拿大大草原上肆虐。当它们南迁时会发生什么？ 👇
item.description: A breed of “turbocharged superpigs” is raising hell on the Canadian prairies. What could happen when they move south? econ.st/42zyBdk 👇

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普对 "七宗罪 "的了解比对《圣经》内容的了解还要深入。为什么这么多保守派基督徒如此狂热地支持他，甚至相信他是上帝的选民？ 👇
item.description: Donald Trump is more intimately acquainted with the seven deadly sins than the contents of the Bible. Why do so many conservative Christians support him so avidly—and even believe he was chosen by God? econ.st/3HSgghQ 👇

item.title: HS2 的支持者梦想建造一条可与日本和法国铁路相媲美的铁路，以无愧于英国维多利亚时代先驱的工程壮举将英国的大城市连接起来。然而，该项目却表明，英国无法建造 👇。
item.description: Proponents of HS2 dreamed of a railway to rival those in Japan and France, linking Britain’s big cities in a feat of engineering worthy of the country’s Victorian pioneers. Instead the project has shown that Britain cannot build econ.st/3SzLwas 👇

item.title: 2021 年 7 月，弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）发表了一篇文章，在 1000 年的历史中狂奔，声称俄罗斯人和乌克兰人是一个民族。这七张地图展示了他对过去的歪曲👇。
item.description: In July 2021 Vladimir Putin published an essay that raced through 1,000 years of history to argue that Russians and Ukrainians are one people. These seven maps demonstrate his distortion of the past econ.st/3SDAz7Y 👇

item.title:
秘密大会 "理论认为，只要没有人大惊小怪，就能成功达成妥协。
在此，我们（静静地）为众议院以压倒性优势通过的相当不错的税收协议鼓掌👇。
item.description:
The “secret congress” theory holds that a successful compromise can happen as long as no one makes a fuss over it.

Here we (quietly) applaud the rather good tax deal that the House of Representatives passed by an overwhelming margin econ.st/3OD1AqE 👇

item.title: 知道 "专项拨款 "和 "猪肉桶支出 "的区别吗？(这是一个技巧问题。）通过这些有用的解释来了解美国政治 🇺🇸
item.description: Know the difference between “earmarks” and “pork-barrel spending”? (That’s a trick question.) Brush up on American politics with these helpful explanations econ.st/42xpEks 🇺🇸

item.title: 今晚想看点什么？试试这些节目 👇
item.description: Looking for something to watch tonight? Try some of these shows econ.st/3w2zjn4 👇

item.title:
就在美国标准普尔 500 指数屡创新高之际，中国和香港市场仅在 1 月份就下跌了 150 亿美元。
要重新赢得投资者的信任，就必须重新思考国家在经济中的作用。但习近平不太可能放松他的控制 👇
item.description:
Even as America’s S&P 500 index reached record highs, markets in China and Hong Kong shed $1.5trn in January alone.

Regaining investors’ trust requires a rethink of the state’s role in the economy. But Xi Jinping is unlikely to soften his grip econ.st/49j6d18 👇

item.title: 从 2008 年到 2022 年，美国各州总检察长的竞选成本提高了 12 倍。这种现金流反映了这些顶级律师对全国政治和政策的影响力👇。
item.description: Between 2008 and 2022 the cost of state attorney-general races in America became 12 times pricier. This cashflow reflects the power that these top lawyers have over nationwide politics and policy econ.st/42yUCst 👇

item.title:
美国与伊朗的影子战争会升级吗？制衡 "栏目：
前美国中央司令部司令弗兰克-麦肯齐将军 美国上次攻击伊朗领土的情况 @AntonLaGuardia 从中东发回的报道
item.description:
Could America’s shadow war with Iran escalate? On “Checks and Balance”: econ.st/3OEFPXt

🎧 General Frank McKenzie, former commander of US Central Command
🎧 The last time America attacked Iranian territory
🎧 @AntonLaGuardia reports from the Middle East

item.title: 如何判断全球变暖已超过 1.5°C？我们用四张图表来解释👇。
item.description: How can you tell when the world has passed 1.5°C of global warming? We explain in four charts econ.st/499BcNs 👇

item.title: 自美国最高法院推翻 "罗伊诉韦德 "案、终止联邦宪法规定的堕胎权以来，已有七个州就这一问题举行了投票倡议。佛罗里达州可能是下一个发起倡议的州之一。
item.description: Since America’s Supreme Court overturned Roe v Wade and ended a federal constitutional right to abortion, seven states have held ballot initiatives on the issue. Florida may be among the next econ.st/3Uxe7j9 👇

item.title: 本周，评级机构穆迪将纽约社区银行降级为垃圾级。这对更广泛的银行系统有何启示？ 👇
item.description: This week Moody’s, a rating agency, downgraded New York Community Bancorp to junk status. What does this tell observers about the broader banking system? econ.st/4bvfAww 👇

item.title:
普京接受了塔克-卡尔森的采访。不过，仔细观察就会发现，这篇访谈提供了很有价值的见解，尽管这可能不是两位参与者想要表达的观点：
插图：KAL
item.description:
It is hard to blame anyone for skipping Vladimir Putin’s interview with Tucker Carlson. Watch closely, though, and it offers valuable insights, if probably not the kind either participant intended: econ.st/3SztGUX

Illustration: KAL
